```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}

theday <- '2022-06-20'

SB_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/SB/SB_processed_CR800.csv")
SB_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(SB_Processed$TIMESTAMP, 
                                    tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
SB_6_7<-SB_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

TP_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/TP/TP_processed_CR800.csv")
TP_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(TP_Processed$TIMESTAMP, 
                                    tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
TP_6_7<-TP_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

EB_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/EB/EB_processed_CR800.csv")
EB_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(EB_Processed$TIMESTAMP, 
                                    tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
EB_6_7<-EB_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

NN_Processed<- read.csv("./processed_data/NN/NN_processed_CR800.csv")
NN_Processed$TIMESTAMP<- as.POSIXct(NN_Processed$TIMESTAMP, 
                                    tz="", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M")
NN_6_7<-NN_Processed%>%
  mutate(day=date(TIMESTAMP))%>%
  filter(day==theday)

compareplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data = TP_6_7, aes(x = TIMESTAMP, y = LWmV_50ft_Avg))+
  geom_point(data= SB_6_7, aes(x = TIMESTAMP, y = LWmV_50ft_Avg)) +
  geom_line(data= NN_6_7, aes(x = TIMESTAMP, y = LWmV_17ft_Avg, color="red"))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.position = "right")
compareplot

winddirplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data= NN_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=WindDir_D1_WVT))+
  geom_point(data= SB_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=WindDir_D1_WVT))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+
  theme_bw()
winddirplot

windspeedplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data= NN_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=WS_ms_Avg))+
  geom_point(data= SB_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=WS_ms_Avg))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+
  theme_bw()

windspeedplot

rhplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data= NN_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=RH_Avg))+
  geom_point(data= SB_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=RH_Avg))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+
  theme_bw()

rhplot

tempplot<- ggplot()+
  geom_line(data= NN_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=AirT_C_Avg))+
  geom_point(data= SB_6_7, aes(x= TIMESTAMP, y=AirT_C_Avg))+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+
  theme_bw()
  tempplot
```
